managementGuide.pestStatus: Blueberry maggot flies usually emerge first in unsprayed blueberries or abandoned plantings.
managementGuide.pestManagement: Set baited traps on field edges or in abandoned plantings to monitor for blueberry maggot adults. Use yellow sticky boards baited with ammonium acetate enhancers as a food attractant. Check traps once or twice per week, as required, and replace traps and baits every third week.
